messages.msgSnippet: ~OR.as it seems.a list for people who wish to be SCHOOLED in how to comply with the ideas and practices of an elite few~ This is so unecessary. How is it
messages.messageBody:
~OR.as it seems.a list for people who wish to be SCHOOLED in how to
comply with the ideas and practices of an elite few~

This is so unecessary. How is it helping anyone unschool?

First of all, to SCHOOL someone they'd be required to be here. We'd
make you read certain things, answer specific questions and give you
grades for not answering correctly. You'd have no choice in the matter
and your grade would be at our whim. Comparing an email list that has
a very specific purpose to SCHOOLING you is ridiculous.

Rather than whine about how a list is run, start one.
I get really tired of people telling me HOW to volunteer my time.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
